page.title: 11Recreation and sport.
page.content: Although South Wales is renowned for the almost religious playing of Rugby Union the allocated area does not have any Rugby teams or pitches. In fact, most surprisingly the main sport is golf. The Mountain Ash Golf Club at Cefnpennar (Ref. 037.004) was opened in 1908 and recently celebrated it's seventy-fifth year. At the present it has five hundred members and the present club champions are Mr. Steven Lewis (Silver Division of Men's Championship) and Mrs. Eileen Lewis (Ladies Championship). Abercwmboi has its own Football team and they recently gained promotion into the first division of the Welsh Amateur League. Due to land reclamation a great deal of playing-field space has been gained in Cwmaman.
